00017 class SearchIs : public IWhen
00018 {
00019 public:
00020     SearchIs() {}
00021 
00022     SearchIs(std::string search_string, int search_option) : m_search_string(search_string), m_search_option(search_option) {}
00023 
00024     void occurs(const World& world)
00025     {
00026         m_query = boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults>(new SearchResultsSerial(m_search_string));
00027         boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = world.GetGiven<TestTranslation>()->get_translation();        
00028         translation->search(m_query, m_search_option);
00029     }
00030 
00031     boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> get_search_results() const
00032     {
00033         return m_query;
00034     }
00035 
00036 private:
00037     boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> m_query;
00038     std::string m_search_string;
00039     int m_search_option;
00040 };

00043 class CorrectResultsAreReturned : public IThen
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     CorrectResultsAreReturned() {}
00047 
00048     CorrectResultsAreReturned(std::vector<int> expected_results) : m_expected_results(expected_results) {}
00049 
00050     void ensure_that(const World& world)
00051     {
00052         boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> actual_results = world.GetWhen<SearchIs>()->get_search_results();
00053 
00054         int number_of_expected_results = static_cast<int>(m_expected_results.size());
00055 
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(number_of_expected_results, actual_results->num_results());
00057 
00058         for (int idx = 0; idx < number_of_expected_results; ++idx)
00059         {
00060             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(m_expected_results[idx], actual_results->at(idx));
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064 private:
00065     std::vector<int> m_expected_results;
00066 };
00067 
00068 class CorrectNumberOfResultsAreReturned : public IThen
00069 {
00070 public:
00071     CorrectNumberOfResultsAreReturned() {}
00072 
00073     CorrectNumberOfResultsAreReturned(int expected_number_of_results) : m_expected_number_of_results(expected_number_of_results) {}
00074 
00075     void ensure_that(const World& world)
00076     {
00077         boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> actual_results = world.GetWhen<SearchIs>()->get_search_results();
00078 
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(m_expected_number_of_results, actual_results->num_results());
00080     }
00081 
00082 private:
00083     int m_expected_number_of_results;
00084 };

00086 class TranslationSearchBehavior : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00087 {
00088     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(TranslationSearchBehavior);
00089     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldTreatSpacesInSearchStringAsAndOperators);
00090     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldUseCaseSensitiveSearchWhenRequested);
00091     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldUseCaseInsensitiveSearchWhenRequested);
00092     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldUseCaseSensitiveSearchAndMatchWholeWordsWhenRequested);
00093     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldUseCaseInsensitiveSearchAndMatchWholeWordsWhenRequested);
00094     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00095 
00096 public:
00097     void shouldTreatSpacesInSearchStringAsAndOperators()
00098     {
00099         World world(get_world_with_test_translation_given());
00100 
00101         std::vector<int> expected_results;
00102         expected_results.push_back(13);
00103         expected_results.push_back(15);
00104 
00105         world.When<SearchIs>("God lights", CaseSensitive);
00106         world.Then<CorrectResultsAreReturned>(expected_results);
00107     }
00108 
00109     void shouldUseCaseSensitiveSearchWhenRequested()
00110     {
00111         World world(get_world_with_test_translation_given());
00112 
00113         world.When<SearchIs>("God", CaseSensitive);
00114         world.Then<CorrectNumberOfResultsAreReturned>(285);
00115     }
00116 
00117     void shouldUseCaseInsensitiveSearchWhenRequested()
00118     {
00119         World world(get_world_with_test_translation_given());
00120 
00121         world.When<SearchIs>("god", CaseInsensitive);
00122         world.Then<CorrectNumberOfResultsAreReturned>(310);
00123     }
00124 
00125     void shouldUseCaseSensitiveSearchAndMatchWholeWordsWhenRequested()
00126     {
00127         World world(get_world_with_test_translation_given());
00128 
00129         world.When<SearchIs>("god", CaseSensitive|MatchWholeWord);
00130         world.Then<CorrectNumberOfResultsAreReturned>(2);
00131     }
00132 
00133     void shouldUseCaseInsensitiveSearchAndMatchWholeWordsWhenRequested()
00134     {
00135         World world(get_world_with_test_translation_given());
00136 
00137         world.When<SearchIs>("god", CaseInsensitive|MatchWholeWord);
00138         world.Then<CorrectNumberOfResultsAreReturned>(286);
00139     }
00140 
00141 private:
00142     const World& get_world_with_test_translation_given()
00143     {
00144         static WorldWithTestTranslationGiven world_with_test_translation;
00145         return world_with_test_translation.get_world();
00146     }
00147 };
